Cultivate & Share your Digital Garden

on your own terms

 

Tagayasu is a writing tool for non-linear thinkers. Each note, article, or blog post is bidirectionally linked to related notes, forming a web of knowledge.

Cultivate your own Wikipedia-like digital garden as a home for your ideas, journal, school notes, or professional knowledge base.

Tagayasu is backed by nostr, a decentralized storage platform. This means you are in control of your content, even if Tagayasu goes offline.

Choose any relay provider to store your content, or even run your own node to become fully soverign.

Draft your content using a friendly dual-pane editor. Write in markdown and visulize a live preview directly in your browser.

Include inline images, links, and even formatted code snippets to make your notes appear just as you like them.

Start Writing
